bill_title: restrict certain developmental or technical fees associated with the sale of agricultural seed, chemical, and fertilizer products.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to restrict certain developmental or technical fees associated with the sale of agricultural seed, chemical, and fertilizer products. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. No person who sells or transfers any seed, commercial feed, animal remedy, commercial fertilizer, soil amendment, pesticide, or any other agricultural fertilizer or agricultural chemical may charge any developmental fee or technical fee associated, directly or indirectly, with the sale or transfer if the person has sold or transferred any such product or substance in any nation other than the United States within the previous calendar year and did not charge a developmental or technical fee in conjunction with such foreign sales or transfers. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
